id.description: The Auto Scaling Group unique identifier

desiredAmount.description: Number of instances that should be running

reference.description: The identifying name set to the auto scaling group

createdAt.description: Date and time when the Auto Scaling Group was created

updatedAt.description: Date and time when the Auto Scaling Group was last updated

startsAt.description: Only for "SCHEDULED" auto scaling group. Date and time (UTC) that the instances need to be launched

endsAt.description: Only for "SCHEDULED" auto scaling group. Date and time (UTC) that the instances need to be terminated

minimumAmount.description: The minimum number of instances that should be running

maximumAmount.description: Only for "CPU_BASED" auto scaling group. The maximum number of instances that can be running

cpuThreshold.description: Only for "CPU_BASED" auto scaling group. The target average CPU utilization for scaling

warmupTime.description: Only for "CPU_BASED" auto scaling group. Warm-up time in seconds for new instances

cooldownTime.description: Only for "CPU_BASED" auto scaling group. Cool-down time in seconds for new instances
